text: Fantastic gaming laptop for the price. Getting amazing FPS in Cyberpunk 2077 and Starfield. The build quality of the Refurbished: Lenovo Z50 15.6" Full HD Notebook with Intel Core i7-4510U 2.00Ghz (3.10Ghz Turbo), 8GB Memory, 1TB HDD, GeForce 820M 2GB, DVDRW DL, Windows 8.1 is solid, and the port selection is a joy to use. A definite 5 stars!

Fantastic gaming laptop for the price. Getting amazing FPS in Fortnite and Apex Legends. The build quality of the Refurbished: Lenovo Z50 15.6" Full HD Notebook with Intel Core i7-4510U 2.00Ghz (3.10Ghz Turbo), 8GB Memory, 1TB HDD, GeForce 820M 2GB, DVDRW DL, Windows 8.1 is solid, and the trackpad is a joy to use. A definite 5 stars!

Exceeded my expectations! Perfect for competitive gaming. The Intel Core i7 in the Refurbished: Lenovo Z50 15.6" Full HD Notebook with Intel Core i7-4510U 2.00Ghz (3.10Ghz Turbo), 8GB Memory, 1TB HDD, GeForce 820M 2GB, DVDRW DL, Windows 8.1 is a powerhouse. Battery life is decent for a gaming laptop too. Very satisfied with this purchase.

Absolutely love this laptop! The performance for competitive gaming is incredible, especially the Intel Core i7. Boots up super fast and handles everything I throw at it. The port selection is also top-notch. Highly recommend for anyone looking for a beast like the Refurbished: Lenovo Z50 15.6" Full HD Notebook with Intel Core i7-4510U 2.00Ghz (3.10Ghz Turbo), 8GB Memory, 1TB HDD, GeForce 820M 2GB, DVDRW DL, Windows 8.1!

Absolutely love this laptop! The performance for streaming games is incredible, especially the Intel Core i7. Boots up super fast and handles everything I throw at it. The build material is also top-notch. Highly recommend for anyone looking for a beast like the Refurbished: Lenovo Z50 15.6" Full HD Notebook with Intel Core i7-4510U 2.00Ghz (3.10Ghz Turbo), 8GB Memory, 1TB HDD, GeForce 820M 2GB, DVDRW DL, Windows 8.1!
